## isDef() function

检查值value是否已定义

**Signature:**

```typescript
declare function isDef<T = unknown>(value: T): value is T;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  value | T | 要检查的值 |

**Returns:**

value is T

如果value不等于undefined,那么返回true,否则返回false
